unnormalised: Retail sales in India saw a jump of 15% this Diwali season compared to last yr, according to a report by Retailers Association of India (RAI). Seems like everyone was in a mood to splurge! From electronics to clothes, and even mithai boxes, sales went through the roof.

unnormalised: Online platforms contributed significantly, with Flipkart and Amazon reporting a 20% increase in orders. Groceries were a big hit, with 1.5 million orders placed on BigBasket alone!
